# IPEDSuploadables

IPEDSuploadables produces text files in key-value format which meet the
IPEDS requirements for upload on their website. By using this package,
institutions can avoid the time and risk of manually typing numbers into
web forms across multiple screen. Package documentation (see the
[website](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/)) describes
how an institutionâ€™s data must be formatted to make use of these
scripts.

### The package is currently serving the 2025-2026 IPEDS reporting cycle

## If you are new to this process or are looking for updates

- Learn the package basics with the article [How to use this package to
  support your IPEDS
  reporting](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/articles/howto_overall_ipedsuploadables.html)
- Check the package [news
  page](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/news/index.html)
  for recent updates in this release

## Report Coverage

*As reports are added, this list will be updated.  
You are welcome to fork this repo and work towards new reports or new
institution-types for existing reports*

### Supported surveys that work for all institutions:

- Admissions \[partial\]  
- Completions
- Outcome Measures

### Supported surveys that only work for some institutions:

- Graduation Rates: 4-year institutions
- 200% Graduation Rates: 4-year institutions
- 12-month Enrollment: 4-year degree granting institutions
- Fall Enrollment: 4-year degree granting institutions
- Human Resources: degree granting institutions with more than 15 FTE

### Unsupported surveys with options

- Academic Libraries: This survey is no longer collected by IPEDS as of
  the 2025-2026 reporting cycle. For previous years, you can download an
  IPEDS-compatible file from the ACRL site if you complete that
  survey.  
- Admissions \[partial\]: Visit [How to produce other key-value
  uploads](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/articles/howto_use_autoformat.html)
- Cost I: Visit [How to produce other key-value
  uploads](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/articles/howto_use_autoformat.html)
- Cost II: Visit [How to produce other key-value
  uploads](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/articles/howto_use_autoformat.html)
- Finance: Visit [How to produce other key-value
  uploads](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/articles/howto_use_autoformat.html)
- Institutional Characteristics: Visit [How to produce other key-value
  uploads](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/articles/howto_use_autoformat.html)
- Student Financial Aid: Visit [How to produce other key-value
  uploads](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/articles/howto_use_autoformat.html)

## Websites

For code, issues, etc, visit [the GitHub
site](https://github.com/AlisonLanski/IPEDSuploadables/).  
To see full documentation, visit [the package
website](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/).

## Installation

You can install the package in the standard way from CRAN

``` R
install.packages("IPEDSuploadables")
```

To get newer releases or bug fixes before they are posted to the CRAN
version, you can install the development version from
[GitHub](https://github.com/AlisonLanski/IPEDSuploadables) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("AlisonLanski/IPEDSuploadables")

#or use

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("AlisonLanski/IPEDSuploadables")
```

To access vignettes locally (instead of through the website) add an
argument:

``` r
devtools::install_github("AlisonLanski/IPEDSuploadables", build_vignettes = TRUE)
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`IPEDSuploadables`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/IPEDSuploadables.md)
  :

  `IPEDSuploadables` package

- [`adm_students`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/adm_students.md)
  : Dummy student-level data for Admissions parts B, C, D, F, G, H

- [`apply_upload_format()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/apply_upload_format.md)
  : Shortcut function to turn a dataframe into key-value pairs

- [`com_cips`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/com_cips.md)
  : Dummy cip data for Completions functions

- [`com_students`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/com_students.md)
  : Dummy student data for Completions functions

- [`create_dummy_data_adm()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/create_dummy_data_adm.md)
  : Create dummy data for testing the Admissions functions

- [`create_dummy_data_com()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/create_dummy_data_com.md)
  : Create dummy data for testing the completions functions

- [`create_dummy_data_e1d()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/create_dummy_data_e1d.md)
  : Create dummy data for testing the completions functions

- [`create_dummy_data_ef1()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/create_dummy_data_ef1.md)
  : Create dummy data for testing the fall enrollment functions

- [`create_dummy_data_gr()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/create_dummy_data_gr.md)
  : Create dummy data for testing the Grad Rates functions

- [`create_dummy_data_gr200()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/create_dummy_data_gr200.md)
  : Create dummy data for testing the Grad Rates 200 function

- [`create_dummy_data_hr()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/create_dummy_data_hr.md)
  : Create dummy data for testing the hr functions

- [`create_dummy_data_om()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/create_dummy_data_om.md)
  : Create dummy data for testing the outcome measures functions

- [`e1d_instr`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/e1d_instr.md)
  : Dummy aggregated data for 12 Month Enrollment part B

- [`e1d_students`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/e1d_students.md)
  : Dummy student-level data for 12 Month Enrollment parts A, C, D, E,
  and F

- [`ef1_retention`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/ef1_retention.md)
  : Dummy student retention data for Fall Enrollment scripts part E

- [`ef1_students`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/ef1_students.md)
  : Dummy student data for Fall Enrollment scripts

- [`get_ipeds_unitid()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/get_ipeds_unitid.md)
  : Grab institution's UNITID from supplied data to populate
  missing-data rows

- [`gr200_students`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/gr200_students.md)
  : Dummy student data for Graduation Rates 200 functions

- [`gr_students`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/gr_students.md)
  : Dummy student data for the Graduation Rates scripts

- [`hr_staff`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/hr_staff.md)
  : Dummy staff data for Human Resources functions

- [`make_adm_part_B()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_adm_part_B.md)
  : Make Admissions Part B (First-time student demographics)

- [`make_adm_part_C()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_adm_part_C.md)
  : Make Admissions Part C (First-time SAT/ACT scores)

- [`make_adm_part_D()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_adm_part_D.md)
  : Make Admissions Part D (First-time sex unknown)

- [`make_adm_part_F()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_adm_part_F.md)
  : Make Admissions Part F (Transfer student demographics)

- [`make_adm_part_G()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_adm_part_G.md)
  : Make Admissions Part G (Transfer sex unknown)

- [`make_adm_part_H()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_adm_part_H.md)
  : Make Admissions Part H (Transfer SAT/ACT scores)

- [`make_com_part_A()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_com_part_A.md)
  : Make Completions Part A

- [`make_com_part_B()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_com_part_B.md)
  : Make Completions Part B

- [`make_com_part_C()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_com_part_C.md)
  : Make Completions Part C

- [`make_com_part_D()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_com_part_D.md)
  : Make Completions Part D

- [`make_com_part_E()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_com_part_E.md)
  : Make Completions Part E (gender details)

- [`make_e1d_part_A()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_e1d_part_A.md)
  : Make 12 Month Enrollment Part A

- [`make_e1d_part_B()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_e1d_part_B.md)
  : Make 12 Month Enrollment Part B

- [`make_e1d_part_C()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_e1d_part_C.md)
  : Make 12 Month Enrollment Part C

- [`make_e1d_part_D()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_e1d_part_D.md)
  : Make 12 Month Enrollment Part D (gender details)

- [`make_e1d_part_E()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_e1d_part_E.md)
  : Make 12 Month Enrollment Part E

- [`make_e1d_part_F()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_e1d_part_F.md)
  : Make 12 Month Enrollment Part F

- [`make_ef1_part_A()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_ef1_part_A.md)
  : Make Fall Enrollment Part A

- [`make_ef1_part_B()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_ef1_part_B.md)
  : Make Fall Enrollment Part B

- [`make_ef1_part_C()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_ef1_part_C.md)
  : Make Fall Enrollment Part C

- [`make_ef1_part_D()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_ef1_part_D.md)
  : Make Fall Enrollment Part D

- [`make_ef1_part_E()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_ef1_part_E.md)
  : Make Fall Enrollment Part E

- [`make_ef1_part_F()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_ef1_part_F.md)
  : Make Fall Enrollment Part F

- [`make_ef1_part_G()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_ef1_part_G.md)
  : Make Fall Enrollment Part G

- [`make_ef1_part_H()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_ef1_part_H.md)
  : Make Fall Enrollment Part H (Sex Unknown)

- [`make_gr200()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_gr200.md)
  : Make Graduation Rates 200

- [`make_gr_part_B()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_gr_part_B.md)
  : Make Graduation Rates Part B

- [`make_gr_part_C()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_gr_part_C.md)
  : Make Graduation Rates Part C

  : Make Human Resources Part A1

  : Make Human Resources Part A2

  : Make Human Resources Part H2

  : Make Outcome Measures Part A

  : Make Outcome Measures Part B

- [`make_om_part_C()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_om_part_C.md)
  : Make Outcome Measures Part C

- [`make_om_part_D()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/make_om_part_D.md)
  : Make Outcome Measures Part D

- [`om_students`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/om_students.md)
  : Dummy data for Outcome Measures functions

- [`prep_adm_data_frame()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/prep_adm_data_frame.md)
  : Some initial recodes for Admissions parts C and D

- [`prep_com_data_frame()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/prep_com_data_frame.md)
  : Some initial recoding for Completions

- [`prep_ef1_data_frame()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/prep_ef1_data_frame.md)
  : Some initial recoding for Fall Enrollment

- [`prep_hr_data_frame()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/prep_hr_data_frame.md)
  : Some initial recoding for Human Resources

- [`prep_om_awards()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/prep_om_awards.md)
  : Set up extra_awards df for Outcome Measures part B, C, D

- [`prep_om_data_frame()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/prep_om_data_frame.md)
  : Some initial recoding for OutcomeMeasures

- [`produce_adm_report()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/produce_adm_report.md)
  : Shortcut function to do all steps to produce a report

- [`produce_com_report()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/produce_com_report.md)
  : Shortcut function with all steps to provide a Completions report

- [`produce_e1d_report()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/produce_e1d_report.md)
  : Shortcut function with all steps to provide a 12 Month Enrollment
  report

- [`produce_ef1_report()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/produce_ef1_report.md)
  : Shortcut function with all steps to provide a Fall Enrollment report

- [`produce_gr200_report()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/produce_gr200_report.md)
  : Shortcut function with all steps to provide a Grad Rates 200 report

- [`produce_gr_report()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/produce_gr_report.md)
  : Shortcut function with all steps to provide a Graduation Rates
  report

- [`produce_hr_report()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/produce_hr_report.md)
  : Shortcut function with all steps to provide a Human Resources report

- [`produce_om_report()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/produce_om_report.md)
  : Shortcut function with all steps to provide an Outcome Measures
  report

- [`produce_other_report()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/produce_other_report.md)
  : Produce an upload-compatible txt file from pre-aggregated files

- [`set_report_path()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/set_report_path.md)
  : Set the path for where the reports will be saved to.

- [`specs_ADM`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/specs_ADM.md)
  : Table of data requirements for the Admissions starting dataframe

- [`specs_COM`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/specs_COM.md)
  : Table of data requirements for Completions starting dataframe

- [`specs_E1D`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/specs_E1D.md)
  : Table of data requirements for 12 Month Enrollment starting
  dataframes

- [`specs_EF1`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/specs_EF1.md)
  : Table of data requirements for Fall Enrollment starting dataframes

- [`specs_GR`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/specs_GR.md)
  : Table of data requirements for Graduation Rates starting dataframe

- [`specs_GR200`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/specs_GR200.md)
  : Table of data requirements for Grad Rates 200 starting dataframe

- [`specs_HR`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/specs_HR.md)
  : Table of data requirements for HR starting dataframe

- [`specs_OM`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/specs_OM.md)
  : Table of data requirements for OM starting dataframe

- [`write_report()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/write_report.md)
  : Write the prepared data to a txt file in key-value format

- [`write_report_csv()`](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/reference/write_report_csv.md)
  : Write the prepared data to a csv file

# Articles

### All vignettes

- [How to use this package to support your IPEDS
  reporting](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/articles/howto_overall_ipedsuploadables.md):

  This package is will ingest your institutional data, aggregate/reshape
  that data, and produce a text file which is compatible with the IPEDS
  report upload requirements.

- [How to produce other key-value
  uploads](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/articles/howto_use_autoformat.md):

- [Set up your data for IPEDS 12 Month Enrollment
  processing](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/articles/setup_for_12monthenrollment.md):

- [Set up your data for IPEDS Admissions
  processing](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/articles/setup_for_admissions.md):

- [Set up your data for IPEDS Completions
  processing](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/articles/setup_for_completions.md):

- [Set up your data for IPEDS Fall Enrollment
  processing](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/articles/setup_for_fallenrollment.md):

- [Set up your data for IPEDS GR
  processing](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/articles/setup_for_gr.md):

- [Set up your data for IPEDS Graduation Rates 200
  processing](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/articles/setup_for_gr200.md):

- [Set up your data for IPEDS HR
  processing](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/articles/setup_for_hr.md):

- [Set up your data for IPEDS OM
  processing](https://alisonlanski.github.io/IPEDSuploadables/articles/setup_for_om.md):
